// msg New version available. 

Please update to the latest version from the PlayStore. NO HISTORY NO TOKEN NO NFT There are no coin transactions. There are no tokens. Tap the card to copy it Tap box for copy Tap the box for copy Tap mnemonic phrases box for copy PrivateKey copied
Clear your clipboard after paste it! Address copied Mnemonic copied
Clear your clipboard after paste it! Enter PIN Press again to cancel. Please insert account name. All information in your account will be deleted.
If you have not backed up your mnemonic or private key, you will not be able to permanently restore your wallet! Create an account with a set of mnemonics Restore an account with your mnemonics Restore an account with your private key Restore an account with QR Code This phrase is the only way to recover your account. Losing this mnemonics could lead to loss of your asset. Tap to add amount Tap to add address Tap to add memo Only a handful of validators will process this Tx. A few validators will process this Tx. Most validators will process this Tx. This chain support zero Tx fee. This chain support fixed Tx fee. The transaction is completed
You can view details on Mintscan. View in MINTSCAN View in EXPLORER The transaction you requested has been successfully broadcasted to the blockchain. However, there is a delay in displaying the result. 

Please press the "wait" button below to wait until the result is displayed, or press "close" to return to your wallet dashboard and check your TX in the history tab later. Add staking quantity. Start unstaking. Continue staking with changing validators. You receive accumulated rewards. Immediately stake the accumulated rewards. Cancel unstake and immediately make staked state. You can change reward recipient address.
After change this, every claimed rewards are going to changed address. Please confirm you have full authority with to change address. Do not set as exchange address. Exchange the coins you have
for a variety of different coins Discover, Track & Trade
Everything DeFi, NFT and
Gaming The coins purchased can be
used for online transactions
and investments Second generation blockchain
analytics platform specialized in
on-chain data visualization Easily claim all rewards
exceeding $0.1 across Cosmos
chains with a single click Enjoy the eighth wonder of 
the world with a single click Check the list of live proposals
of the chains you staked and
vote for Use the collateralized USDX minting
function using the CDP module Use the HARD landing platform
to deposit assets and borrow
other assets based on LTV Provide liquidity to AMM-style asset
swap pools on the KAVA platform Earn KAVA Take advantage of Farming
strategies compound your earnings 1/4 Broadcasting BEP3 send Tx from sending chain. 2/4 Confirming swapid. 3/4 Broadcasting BEP3 claim Tx on receiving chain. 4/4 Confirming all Tx on each chain. Cosmostation Mobile is a non-custodial wallet service, so users are responsible for executing all transactions. Please always check the details accurately before sending a transaction. 

We are not responsible for any losses resulting from transactions through the app. Register your frequently used addresses in the address book to streamline your future transactions. Please check the mnemonic you entered. 
Just so you know, don't share it with anyone. Losing this mnemonic can lead to loss of assets. You can create a new account using the same mnemonic, but with a different HD Path.

In general, there is a possibility that it may not be compatible with other wallets, and it is recommended to be used only by those with background knowledge of crypto keys and HD Path. Enter your new PIN Verify your new PIN We are currently under maintenance.

Please check our community channels for more information. If you proceed with the currently selected swap, significant property damage is expected.

Please check the expected input and output values and decide carefully. Show all proposals. Filters out suspected of scam proposals. Data Synchronizing. Enter the Encryption Key displayed on the screen to restore your account. The transaction is currently running.
Please wait a moment. The memo has changed compared to the existing address book.
Would you like to update with new memo? You can check the flow of
assets on the block explorer Information on all assets and tokens is being developed together with the community.

If you do not see your token, please provide the GitHub link below to the token issuer or community.

Once information about the token is registered, it is automatically displayed in your wallets and MintScan.
Not only you but all users in the community can view and use it together. ▪ Please check the current network status of the device.

▪ If there is a problem with the node you are currently using, you can easily switch to another node through [Settings > Manage Chains] and continue using the service.

 ▪ If all nodes are unavailable, the chain being used is being upgraded. Please wait until the upgrade is complete. Filters proposals that have already been voted on All live proposals must be selected in order to be able to
vote Swipe and exclude proposals to vote later Check the reward amount and Tx fee amount.
Please swipe to exclude rewards you would like to receive in the future. The chain you selected is scheduled to end support. For more information, please refer to the foundation's official announcement. Check the to compounding amount and Tx fee amount.
Please swipe to exclude you would like to compounding in the future. Information on all NFT collections is developed together with the community.

If you do not see your collection or NFT, please provide the GitHub link below to the publisher or community.

Once information about the collection is registered, it will be automatically displayed,
Not only for the customer but also for all users in the community. You can check and use it. Display total value of on-chain assets. Additionally, main asset's price and price change are displayed. The chain you selected will be discontinued from mobile wallets. It can be supported by other wallets or future custom chain services. Accounts on the legacy path you selected will be terminated. We strongly recommend that you move your assets to the public path. Send %1$s Network asset ONLY This address is where you receive reward assets.
Tap here for change reward address. (not recommend) You changed a reward address Long press for copy Affects your assets Not affects your assets Only sign this message if you trust the requesting site and fully understand its contents To enhance user convenience and response speed, we support the injection method (EIP-6963). When using DApps, please select your desktop wallet, etc.
You can experience the same user experience as with the desktop extension wallet.
For EVM-based DApps, by supporting the EIP-6963 specification, you can enjoy a seamless web3 experience. Fees are pay to the chain, not to wallet Epochs are created every 24 hours If you have started staking, it will remain in a 'pending' state until the current epoch (%1$s) ends At the end of the next epoch (%1$s), rewards will be distributed. Each subsequent epoch will be repeated Rewards are compounded and can be used immediately after the start of unstaking (Recommended) Would you like to reset the End-Points for all chains to their default settings?

End-Points are servers that manage connections to the blockchain network, ensuring that data can be transmitted and received smoothly when the stable End-Point is used. %1$s will activate in Next Epoch %1$s On the BABYLON chain, staking actions (Stake, Unstake, Validator, Switch Validator, Unstake Cancel, etc.) start in a Pending state.
Once the current epoch ends and the next epoch begins, the staking action will transition to Active. The Active state means that the Pending state has ended, and the executed actions are now fully activated.
In this state, all staking functions requested by the user are working as intended. sBTC Staking Reward is excluded from compounding Hide for the next 7 days This is the combined amount of %1$s staked in Taproot and Native Segwit. $%1$s Reward Distribution Rewards are paid in $%1$s to my %2$s address. BTC staking requires an additional fee in BABY, deducted from your BABY balance at <font color="#BED1F2">%1$s</font> sBTC staking requires an additional fee in tBABY, deducted from your tBABY balance at <font color="#BED1F2">%1$s</font> After staking $%1$s, it is locked for up to <font color="#BED1F2">%2$s weeks.</font>
After this period, it becomes automatically withdrawable without unstaking. You can unstake at any time, It will become withdrawable after a <font color="#BED1F2">7-day</font> unstaking period. Softly,calmly. Dive deeper with Dark Theme Like a scene from space - a new view every time Use this option for <font color="#BED1F2">‘0x...’</font> address Use this option for <font color="#BED1F2">‘%1$s...’</font> address or IBC Send Depositing Cosmos ecosystem coins to a centralized exchange without a memo may result in asset loss. A single address can connect multiple EVM networks, but not recommended for exchanges. Make changes to the saved address. Discard the registered address from list. You're about to delete this address. Once deleted,
you will need to register it again from the beginning. You can add new addresses
in the Settings screen

for fee. Invalid Address, please check again. Self sending is not support. No enough reward to Claim. Fee is bigger than reward.

You can use compounding feature after reset your reward address to self. This address is already registered as your claim reward address. Not enough deposit to withdraw. Can not borrowable now. Can not repay now. Sorry!
An error occurred while sending during swap Tx.
Please check below. The sending chain successfully attempted a swap, but the swap ID has not been found yet.

Press the "Wait" button to continue searching for the swap ID to perform the swap.
If you press the "Close" button, your funds will be refunded to your original wallet after a certain period of time. No deposited asset. Please select more than 1 validator. You can select max 30 validators. could not find a swap chain with both the requested source and dest assets Please wait for a moment. Synchronizing. Please enter your name correctly. %1$s is an unsupported chain. Unknown QR Code. Decryption error This chain does not yet support unstaking cancellation. Network with the node is not smooth. Please try again later. Send functionality of the selected chain is currently disabled.
It can be activated later through the onchain governance procedure. BGT is a staking-only asset.
Transmission is not possible. Can not use this You cannot vote because there is not enough delegation. Vote is not support. Unsupported chain in mobile You can only vote for one BeraChain. %1$s does not support mobile injection. Not enough SUI coins (1.05 or more is possible).

Staking fee 0.05 Staking is possible from 1 IOTA or more Pending. UnStaking is not possible. No enough balance for send. Please check your memo size. Waiting for the previous transaction to be processed The data cannot be read because it is not in the correct format Staking amount must be at least %1$s Staking amount must be no more than %1$s Send amount at least ^1 SOL for the rent vRISE is a staking-only asset.

// quotes
Not competition, Just Connect. — Jae Kwon
I see Bitcoin as ultimately becoming a reserve currency for banks, playing much the same role as gold did in the early days of banking. Banks could issue digital cash with greater anonymity and lighter weight, more efficient transactions. — Hal Finney
Bitcoin is structure is very ingenious. The paper money disappears, and crypto-currencies are a much better way to transfer values than a piece of paper, that's for sure. — Elon Musk
I find that oftentimes the most ironic and entertaining outcome is the most likely. And the most entertaining outcome would be Dogecoin becoming the global new earth currency. — Elon Musk
Bitcoin is exciting because it shows how cheap it can be. Bitcoin is better than currency in that you don't have to be physically in the same place and, of course, for large transactions, currency can get pretty inconvenient. — Bill Gates
Bitcoin is a remarkable cryptographic achievement… The ability to create something which is not duplicable in the digital world has enormous value… Lots of people will build businesses on top of that. — Eric Schmidt
If crypto succeeds, it's not because it empowers better people. It's because it empowers better institutions. — Vitalik Buterin
When decentralised blockchain protocols start displacing the centralised web services that dominate the current Internet, we'll start to see real internet-based sovereignty. The future Internet will be decentralised. — Olaf Carlson-Wee
Blockchain technology isn't just a more efficient way to settle securities. It will fundamentally change market structures, and maybe even the architecture of the Internet itself. — Abigail Johnson
Cryptocurrency is such a powerful concept that it can almost overturn governments. — Charles Lee
The reason we are all here is that the current financial system is outdated. — Charlie Shrem
There are 3 eras of currency: Commodity based, politically based, and now, math-based. — Chris Dixon
If you don't believe it or don't get it, I don't have the time to try to convince you, sorry. — Satoshi Nakamoto
Mobile was Internet 2.0. It changed everything. Crypto is Internet 3.0. — Gil Penchina
Not understanding blockchain, it's going to smack you down and make you bleed. — Mark Cuban
Deploying more capital - Steady lads. — Do Kwon
Anything that can conceive of as a supply chain, blockchain can vastly improve its efficiency- it doesn’t matter if its people, numbers, data, money. — Ginni Rometty, CEO of IBM
Every informed person needs to know about Bitcoin because it might be one of the world’s most important developments. — Leon Louw, Noble Peace Prize Nominee
I see Bitcoin as ultimately becoming a reserve currency for banks, playing much the same role as gold did in the early days of banking. Banks could issue digital cash with greater anonymity and lighter weight, more efficient transactions. — Hal Finney
The old question “Is it in the database?” will be replaced by “Is it on the blockchain?” — William Mougayar
Whereas most technologies tend to automate workers on the periphery doing menial tasks, blockchains automate away the center. Instead of putting the taxi driver out of a job, blockchain puts Uber out of a job and lets the taxi drivers work with the customer directly. — Vitalik Buterin
In fact, blockchain has the potential to fundamentally change how we share information, buy and sell things, interact with government, prove our identity, and even verify the authenticity of everything - from the food we eat to the medicine we take to who we say we are. — Julie Sweet
Everything will be tokenized and connected by a blockchain one day. — Fred Ehrsam
The blockchain does one thing: It replaces third-party trust with mathematical proof that something happened. — Adam Draper
The blockchain is the financial challenge of our time. It is going to change the way that our financial world operates. — Blythe Masters
Blockchain is the tech. Bitcoin is merely the first mainstream manifestation of its potential. — Marc Kenigsberg
We have elected to put our money and faith in a mathematical framework that is free of politics and human error. — Tyler Winkelvoss
Bitcoin will do to banks what email did to the postal industry. — Rick Falkvinge
You can’t stop things like Bitcoin. It will be everywhere, and the world will have to readjust. World governments will have to readjust. — John Mcafee
Any time a country transitioned to a fiat currency, they collapsed. That’s just world history; you don’t have to know about cryptocurrency to know that. — Nipsey Hussle
It’s gold for nerds. — Stephen Colbert
The Times 03/Jan/2009 Chancellor on brink of second bailout for banks. (Bitcoin genesis block memo) — Satoshi Nakamoto
